description: The dashboard is designed for KubeDB managed ConnectCluster

panels.description: When this option is enabled, connections attempted using insecure transport will be rejected.
panels.title: Require Secure Transport

panels.description: Total node count of connect cluster
panels.title: Total Nodes

panels.description: Initial Requested CPU amount by ConnectCluster Instance
panels.title: CPU Request (Core)

panels.description: CPU Limit in core by ConnectCluster instance
panels.title: CPU Limit (Core)

panels.description: Initial Requested Memory amount by ConnectCluster Instance
panels.title: Memory Request

panels.description: KubeDB Kafka that connect cluster is using
panels.title: Kafka Reference

targets.expr: sum(sum by (namespace, pod, container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-.+$"}[5m])) * on (namespace, pod) group_left (node) topk by (namespace, pod) (1, max by (namespace, pod, node) (kube_pod_info{node!="",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-.+$"}))) by (pod)

sum(sum by(namespace,pod,container)(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-.+$"}[5m]))* on (namespace, pod) group_left (node) topk by (namespace, pod) (1, max by (namespace, pod, node) (kube_pod_info{node!="",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-.+$"}))) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-.+$"} * on (namespace,pod) group_left () max by (namespace,pod) ((kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))) by (pod)

sum(sum by (namespace, pod, container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-.+$"}[5m])) * on (namespace, pod) group_left (node) topk by (namespace, pod) (1, max by (namespace, pod, node) (kube_pod_info{node!="",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-.+$"}))) by (pod)

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-.+$"} * on (namespace,pod) group_left () max by (namespace,pod) ((kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))) by (pod)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="",metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$app-.+$",container!=""} * on (namespace, pod) group_left (node) topk by (namespace, pod) (1, max by (namespace, pod, node) (kube_pod_info{node!=""}))) by (pod)
